headline: Request a Subscription
sentences:
Access to Archived Local & National News
Access to Legal Listings & Public Notices from The Daily Reporter’s Archives
Custom Data Export Service Available…Call for the details
** NO REFUNDS ** REFUNDS WILL NOT BE PROVIDED FOR ANY SUBSCRIPTION.

With a paid subscription, you will receive a print copy of The Daily Reporter delivered via USPS as well as online access to the current electronic edition, our archived news, legal listing and public notice databases.
To begin your subscription to The Daily Reporter, please complete the form below and then call our office at (614) 224-4835 to provide your credit card information.
WE DO NOT PROVIDE CREDIT, REFUNDS OR PRORATED BILLING FOR SUBSCRIPTIONS THAT ARE CANCELLED PRIOR TO THEIR EXPIRATION DATE.
If unable to reach us by phone, we will use the information you have provided to contact you within 48 hours.
Our newspaper is published Mondays through Fridays, except on federal holidays.
